summary: This module contains unit tests for the jmbase library, covering the color‑coded logging helper, random insertion utility, and a mock‑based testing framework for the JoinMarket protocol. The tests validate logging behavior, utility functions, and command handling with asynchronous message exchange using Twisted.
business_intent: Provide automated verification of core library components to guarantee correct functionality, improve code quality, and support ongoing development of the JoinMarket system.
